snippet: Three unarmed Indian policemen were killed Monday by militants in Indian-administered Kashmir, another in a string of recent attacks.
abstract: Militants kill three unarmed Indian policemen investigating land dispute in Kashmir.
lead_paragraph: Three unarmed Indian policemen were killed Monday by militants in Indian-administered Kashmir, another in a string of recent attacks.

headline.main: India: Officers Die in Kashmir Attack
headline.print_headline: Asia; India: Officers Die in Kashmir Attack
